summary: The vanilla blades armor just looked too plain, so i made this.
descriptionHtml:
Whats up!  This is a texture for the blades armor.  The only thing that bothers me is the shield.

=====INSTALLATION=====
1. Extract
2. Move the whole folder to you skyrim data folder mine: (C:\\Program Files (x86)\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data)
3. Thats it! 

=====REMOVAL=====
1. Delete the blades folder
author: Shuratheblueflame
